Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory

Class DriverCreator<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory.DriverCreator<T>
public class DriverCreator<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>> extends Object
Creates WebDriver instances based on the provided configuration and driver provider.

This class is responsible for setting up WebDriver options, applying necessary configurations, and instantiating the WebDriver either locally or remotely.

The generic type T represents browser-specific configuration options that extend AbstractDriverOptions. This allows flexibility in defining WebDriver settings for different browsers, such as Chrome, Firefox, or Edge.

  • Method Details

    • createDriver

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createDriver(WebDriverConfig<T> config, DriverProvider<T> provider) throws MalformedURLException
      Creates and configures a WebDriver instance based on the given configuration and driver provider.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration settings for the WebDriver instance.
      provider - The driver provider responsible for creating and configuring WebDriver options.
      Returns:
      A fully configured WebDriver instance.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the remote WebDriver URL is invalid.
